member.summary: Authorization Handler which combine and .

member.name: T:MyBlogAPI.Permissions.HasOwnOrAllPermissionRangeForHasUserDtoAuthorizationHandler`1
member.summary: Authorization Handler which combine and .

member.name: T:MyBlogAPI.Permissions.HasAllPermissionRangeAuthorizationHandler`1
member.summary: Authorization Handler used to authorize a resource when the have permission on this Type of resource.
member.example: user "ModeratorName" have permission "PermissionRange.All, PermissionAction.Delete, PermissionTarget.Comment" => This handler requirement will succeed if this user ask authorization to delete a comment.

user "classicUser" doesn't have permission "PermissionRange.All, PermissionAction.Read, PermissionTarget.Role" => This handler requirement won't succeed if this user ask authorization to read (GET) a role.
